description:
I recently got into scrapbooking and I can't wait to share my knowledge with all of you. :)

This workshop we will be making a mini scrapbook / picture display, which you can fold flat or display in your house or give it to someone special. You could go with a Valentine / Holiday / Your boy/girl friend / your family etc theme and select pictures that fit this occasion.

The size of the whole thing will be approx. 15 x 80 cm and can be fold flat.

Please continue reading, because there is some homework!;)

 

 

 

 

 

Homework: Select 5 - 8 pictures and then you can do the following:

A) Send them to me on 17th of January 23:59 at the latest and I will print them at Hema. Note, I will charge a small fee for these pictures if you already had sent them, but cancel for the workshop. Obivously, I will give you these pictures to keep when we meet again, I won't do anything with them.

or

B) Print them at home / at Hema / any other shop and bring your pictures to the workshop. I recommend not just printing them on ordinary paper but use real photo paper. The horizontal squares on the sides and in the middle fit a picture of 10x15 cm, but you can also choose to print two pictures on a 10x15cm to get two smaller pictures

Where: 15 min walk from M Porte de Namur, Brussels (you'll receive my address at least one day before the event upon registering).

Cost: 8 euro (incl. materials, lemonade and cookies; )
Language: English.

Register: I've noticed lately that everyone signs up as soon as there is an activity. description:
One of the questions I often get: "Where do you buy this and that?". I'd like to do a shopping tour through Antwerp (first it was Brussels, but Joana suggested to go outside Brussels, I'm fine with that :).

Shops: We can just walk and shop.

Feel free to suggest other must-see shops.

Costs: free (you pay for your own transport and possible items you want to buy)

Train ticket will cost: € 7,80 (weekend return ticket, available online, might also be available at the machines at the station). In Antwerp, everything (as far as I know) is walking distance.

Meeting point: Brussels Central

Time: Meet around 9:50 at track 5 (have your ticket ready).

Language: English.

Lunch: Let's have some lunch in Antwerp, can anyone recommend a place? Wagamama (Japanese ramen/rice, no sushi) is a place I like, but I'm open for other suggestions.
name: Shopping (for craft supplies) in Antwerp (not in Brussels)

description:
Krimpie dinkie is a technique that some you might know from back when you were a kid. Basically, you take a special type of plastic, color it (with either pencils or permanent markers) and draw any kind of picture.

What is special about krimpie dinkie is that it shrinks in size but increases in thickness. After heating it up in the oven, you'll get a nice and sturdy key chain (you can also use glue it to a hair pin / broche / attach it to your mobile phone).

I've used it to make characters from one of my favorite games (Plants vs. Zombies).

Feel free to Google and print some nice images in advance in case you can't draw like me :).

description:
Hobby Creatief Salon is a Craft Fair in Antwerp (http://www.hobbysalon.be/013/HobbyCreatiefSalon/Antwerpen.htm). There'll be lots of craft related shops that sell supplies and there will also be workshops you can attend (e.g. making jewellery, scrapbooking, and many more). I've been to one before in Mechelen and I really liked it, so I can't wait to go to this one as well :).

Price and travel

Entrance fee is 10.00 euro but you can print a 1.50 euro discount coupon from the website.

The Belgian Rail has a special combination ticket which costs 18.80 euro that includes the entrance fee, the train trip to Antwerp and the tram to Antwerp Expo.

http://www.belgianrail.be/nl/vrije-tijd/b-dagtrips/beurzen-salons/hobby-creatief-salon-antwerpen.aspx

Meeting point

My suggestion is to meet around 9:45 at Brussel Central station.

More detailed information on where we will meet will follow closer to the actual event.

description:
If you sign up for this meetup, you are automatically signed up for all dates in this message, so make sure you can make it.

Crochet for beginners (preparation for crochet blanket)


The first two workshops are on Monday 17th and 24 of March (I won't make a special event for the second date; by signing up here you are automatically signed up for the 24th of March and a spot is booked for the 7 follow up workshops). These workshops are a preparation for the crochet blanket and are obligatory (unless you think you're already quite good at crochet, sign up anyway and send me an e-mail) . During these workshops, you will learn how to crochet a chain, a double crochet, a half double brochet and the granny square stitch.

The blanket


The follow up workshops, where we will actually start working on the blanket are: 31st of March, 14th of April, 21 of April, 28th of April, 12th of May, 19th of May, 26th of May (in total 2+7=9 classes). During each workshop you will learn a new stitch and you are expected to do some homework as well.


After these classes, we will hopefully have reached row 40-45 of the pattern (the entire pattern has 131 rows). In theory, you should be able to continue the pattern by yourself as the pattern repeats stiches you have already done. Please block these dates in your calendar :).

Time & location

Each workshop is from 19:00 - 22:00 and is at my place. There is only space for 4 people. Minimally 3 people are needed to continue the workshop.


Price


* Each workshop costs 8 euro. It is not possible to only come to individual workshops. You sign up for the first two workshops (bank transfer of 16 euro). After that, you decide whether you want to continue with the other 7 workshops (banktransfer of 56 euro).

* Materials are not included. You would need approximately 12 balls of yarn. Each ball costs 2.75 euro, which gives a total of approximately 33 euro. The name of the yarn is Stylecraft Special DK and there is a wide range of colors. You can choose the yarn at my workshop and I will make a group order. I ask everyone to pay the money before I place the order. Feel free to already take a peak and look at the amazing selection of colors available. http://www.echtstudio.nl/wol-en-garen/stylecraft-special-dk.


* Crochet needle: approximately size 4 is needed. Price varies between 3 and 7.50 depending on the type.

I never have typed so much, please comment if things are not clear :).

Shirley
name: Crochet along: blanket

name: Crochet along: blanket

description:
Date of this meetup will be picked based on people who are interested.

Mondays and Wednesdays are not possible in the near future:). Only evenings are possible.

We will crochet a small basket in three evenings (homework included).


Only suitable for people who already have experience with crochet.

• Evening 1 (3 hours): You will learn how to make a magic loop (also really useful when you want to make amigurumis), how to increase with crochet, how to make a double crochet. As homework you will finish the base of the basket


• Evening 2 (3 hours): You will learn how to make the star stitch. As homework you have to continue with the star stitch until you are happy with the height of the basket.


• Evening 3 (1-2 hours): You will learn how to make handles of the basket.


Price for the workshop: 24 euro

• Excluded: two crochet needles (5 and 6 mm) 5 euro (you can keep them). Please let me know if you want to bring your own crochet needles. I don't have spare ones for everyone! You could consider to get an entire set of needles for 8.25 euro at Veritas (http://www.veritas.be/eshop/be_nl/F-1117608-breinaalden-en-haakpennen/P-1141274-).


• Materials wool: 4.50 euro; you can pick any color you like as long as you choose the type Lammy Hawaii (http://www.echtstudio.nl/wol-en-garen/lammy-hawai). I need to know which color you want at the latest on 24th of March[masked]:00.


Total price including materials: 33.50 euro.

Here is some inspiration:

http://www.pinterest.com/search/pins/?q=washi%20tape%20card

Cost: 7 euro (incl. all materials needed)

Language: English.

description:
In this workshop of two evenings we will make a fabric tissue box cover. Fabric is not provided and you will have to buy two patterns/solids that you like (for instance from Veritas). I used a robot patterned fabric and from the inside and at the bottom it is red. You can also order fabric online (for instance here http://www.pindanutjes.be).


What do I need to bring?


Fabric: Please bring two pieces of 100% cotton fabric that measure approximately 110 x 25 cm or two Veritas pieces of fabric of 45 x 55 cm.

Tissue box: If you have a particular brand of tissue box you usually use, please bring it (I use the white Hema boxes, not the yellow-whites one), so we can fit it to the size of your particular tissue box.

A happy mood :)


Registration


Only register if you can make it to both dates (September 10th and 17th, 2014). Cost of the two workshops is 17,50 euro (incl. lemonade and cookies; ). Please transfer 17,50 euro in advance to my bank account, I'll provide you with the details. Classes cannot be rescheduled and money will not be refunded.


Where: 10 min walk from Flagey, Brussels (you'll receive my address at least one day before the event upon registering).

name: Crochet for beginners: granny squares

description:
For those into old 8-bit video games can create their favorite character. You don't need any talent, other than the skill to be able to pick up a bead and place it on the board ;).

 

Cost: 7 euro (incl. materials, lemonade and cookies; )
Language: English.

Register: Please transfer 7 euro to my bank account to complete your registration.


Homework:

Think about what you want to make and bring an printed/digital example (or you could also design something on the spot). If you'd like some inspiration use the word: "perlerbeads" and do a Google image search. Print out some examples (in color) and bring it to this evening (I don't have a color printer). Also, you could take pictures with a camera / phone and use that.

For instance, if you're into pokemon Google : "pokemon perlerbeads".

This website also has nice inspiring examples:

http://www.eksuccessbrands.com/perlerbeads/creative/projects.htm
name: Ironing beads

description:
If you sign up for this meetup, you are automatically signed up for all 7 dates in this message, so make sure you can make it. Sign up is only final after you transferred the participation fee.

During this series of workshops you will learn a lot of different crochet stitches. We start from the basics, so this series of workshops is also suitable for beginners. You can choose to make a blanket of any size. We follow this pattern http://notyouraveragecrochet.com/as-we-go-stripey-blanket but I can teach you additional stitches not in this blanket. Regardless of your experience, you need to work on the blanket also outside the classes, if you want to still use your blanket this winter ;).


Class 1: The first class is meant to practice some basic stitches. During these workshops, you will learn how to crochet a chain, a double crochet and depending how fast you pick up, also a half double crochet and the granny square stitch. During this class you will pick the colors and (if needed) the crochet needle you want.


Class 2 - 7: Classes are there to ask questions, learn new stitches and work on your blanket.


After these classes, you should be able to continue the pattern by yourself as the pattern repeats stiches you have already done. 

Time & location

Each workshop is from 19:00 - 22:00 and is at my place. There is only space for 5 people. Minimally 3 people are needed to continue the workshop.

Dates (all Mondays)

1) 27/10/14
2) (1 week after last class) 04/11/14 (Tuesday)
3) (2 weeks after last class) 18/11/14 (Tuesday)
4) (2 weeks after last class) 01/12/14 (Monday)
5) (2 weeks after last class) 15/12/14 (Monday)
6) (after big holiday break) 12/01/14 (Monday)
7) (2 weeks after last class) 26/01/14 (Monday)

Price


The price for all workshops is 56 euro in total. No refunds are possible and the dates are fixed. Rescheduling a workshop costs 8 euro per rescheduled workshop.

Materials are not included. You would need approximately 12 balls of yarn. Each ball costs 2.75 euro, which gives a total of approximately 33 euro. The name of the yarn is Stylecraft Special DK and there is a wide range of colors. You can choose the yarn at my workshop and I will make a group order, hopefully I can ask a discount because we place a large order. I ask everyone to pay the money before I place the order. Feel free to already take a peak and look at the amazing selection of colors available. http://www.knussel.be/wol/stylecraft-special-dk/ Please note the name and the number of the color.

Crochet needle

Approximately size 4 is needed, depending how tight or loose you crochet. Price varies between 3 and 7.50 depending on the type.

http://www.knussel.be/haaknaalden/ You can choose on this website which one you want.

The price for all workshops is 56 euro in total. No refunds are possible and the dates are fixed. Rescheduling a workshop costs 8 euro per rescheduled workshop.

Materials are not included. You would need approximately 12 balls of yarn. Each ball costs 2.75 euro, which gives a total of approximately 33 euro. The name of the yarn is Stylecraft Special DK and there is a wide range of colors. You can choose the yarn at my workshop and I will make a group order, hopefully I can ask a discount because we place a large order. I ask everyone to pay the money before I place the order. Feel free to already take a peak and look at the amazing selection of colors available. http://www.knussel.be/wol/stylecraft-special-dk/ Please note the name and the number of the color.

Crochet needle

Approximately size 4 is needed, depending how tight or loose you crochet. Price varies between 3 and 7.50 depending on the type.

http://www.knussel.be/haaknaalden/ You can choose on this website which one you want.

name: Christmas cards

description:
Tonight we will be making banners out of paper. You can decide what kind of banner it will be, a Christmas banner? or a Happy B-day banner?

I made a banner with 19 characters and it took me 4 hours to cut everyone and maybe another 2 hours to glue everything together. I suggest you to limit the amount of characters as much as possible. For instance, make a Christmas banner saying 'Merry X-Mas' or 'Happy B-day', but you can always finish the banner at home.

How to prepare for the workshop


1) Choose a paper pad http://www.paperpads.nl/paper-pads-papier/papier-a4/page1.html (note there are three pages to choose from)


2) Choose one or more A4 packs that match your paper pad.


http://www.paperpads.nl/paper-pads-papier/cardstock/linnenkarton-a4/

3) Send me a message of which things you want to order and which you want to write.

4) Transfer me the money, let me know you have transfered it and I will order the cardstock (I need to have the money by 24th of November, 2014).


or skip step 1-4 and buy cardstock by yourself (for instance at Schleiper).
